snippet.title: Adrenaline pumping, action-packed car drifting redemption game
snippet.description:
Drift away from cops in this fast paced car chase, and collect $1000K in gold & cash to WIN BONUS TICKETS !



•  Simple car drifting skill redemption game
•  Realistic steering controller
•  Appeals to all ages
•  60 seconds average game time
•  Attractive cabinet with 43″ HD screen


For sale enquiries and ideas: http://www.touchmagix.com/contactus.php
Call: +91 8600107705 (Enquiries from India)
Or: +91 9665702225 or +91 9096701000 (For Rest of the World)

For Content Ideas on Interactive Walls/Floors/Bars and screens: 
http://www.touchmagix.com
